TopicTitle: Its good to be here folks (:

Articles.Content: Hello! I just found out about this forum and now I finally have a place to talk to other kerbalnauts... dang I really sound cheesy, lol anyways horray! First thead seeyal later
Hello TheFloppyfish and welcoem to our forum.

welcome* ^

Jokes aside, welcome to the forums! As for sounding cheesy, you're fine. Trust me though, you'll be so glad you joined this forum, it is a lot of fun and an all around good experience. Got a question about gameplay? the answer lies on the forums somewhere. Want a mod? On the forums. Want to just talk about whoever and whatever you want to other people? its on the forums. You'll never leave. Cause it's just too awesome. See ya 'round the 'rums!

Welcome.

You'll like it here; by internet standards, this is an astonishingly civilised community. Muchos kudos to the mods and Kerbonauts in general.
